GSP31ttssarvu:3: śreyaḥ karoti jagatāṃ bhagavantamādyaṃ taṃ śrīmaharṣikapilaṃ prabhumānato 'smi // 1 //
GSP31ttssarvu:8: tata etaiḥ samastatattvānāṃ sakalaṣaṣṭitantrārthānāṃ ca sūcanaṃ bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:10: sūtraṣaḍadhyāyī tu vaiśvānarāvatāramaharṣibhagavatkapilapraṇītā iyaṃ tu dvāviṃśatisūtrī tasyā api bījabhūtā nārāyaṇāvatāramaharṣibhagavatkapilapraṇīteti vṛddhāḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:16: tatra mūlaprakṛtiḥ mahattattvam ahaṅkāraḥ śabdatanmātrā sparśatanmātrā rūpatanmātrā rasatanmātrā gandhatanmātrā cetyaṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ santi /
GSP31ttssarvu:17: atra tattvāntarārambhakatvaṃ prakṛtitvam ataśca mahadādīnāṃ saptānāṃ pūrvapūrvavikṛtitve 'pi na atiḥ lakṣaṇasamanvayāt /
GSP31ttssarvu:18_0: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi manaḥ gaganapavanajvalanasaliladharaṇyākhyāni
GSP31ttssarvu:18_1: pañca bhūtāni caitāni ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ vikṛtaya eva na tattvāntārārambhakāṇi sarvaṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:20: ayaṃ ca na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ tābhyaḥ pṛthakkṛtya nirūpaṇāt /
GSP31ttssarvu:21: anena jaḍatvapariṇāmitvakartṛtvādidharmavadbhyaḥ prakṛtyādibhyaḥ puruṣasya vailakṣaṇyamapi sūcitaṃ bhavati tathā ca kārikā /
GSP31ttssarvu:23: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
GSP31ttssarvu:25: nanvetebhyo 'tiriktā anye 'pi bahavo ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ padārthā dṛśyante tatkathameṣāmupapattirata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:27: triguṇa eva traiguṇyaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ sañcāraḥ mattakapotakaṇṭhanyāyena pratikṣaṇaṃ vilakṣaṇapariṇāmo varttata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:28_0: anena mūlaprakṛtistriguṇātmikā tritvena ca bhedabodhakena guṇāḥ parasparaviruddhasvabhāvāḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:28_1: prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ sañcāreṇa ca saṅgatasamyakcaraṇārthakena teṣāṃ nityasabhāvaḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:29_1: saṃsiddhiḥ kāryotpādaśca nāpūrvaḥ kintvāvirbhāvamātraṃ sūkṣmakāraṇarūpeṇa sthitasya
GSP31ttssarvu:29_2: sthūlakāryakṣamarūpeṇa vipariṇāma iti sadvyāptivādaśca ityete siddhāntāḥ saṃsūcitā
GSP31ttssarvu:30: nanu guṇānāmanavaratapariṇatisvabhāvatvāt kadācidapi dṛśyajātādarśanaṃ na syāt tataśca pralayocchedaḥ syādata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:32_1: tathā ca pratilomapariṇāmena tattatkāryāṇāṃ svasvakāraṇe laye jāte triguṇāyāḥ prakṛteḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:33: tadā ca samānapariṇāmatvena vailakṣaṇyānāvirbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP31ttssarvu:36: ātmānamadhikṛtyetyadhyātmam taddvividhaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ceti śārīraṃ vātapittaśleṣmavaiṣamyanimittaṃ mānasaṃ kāmakrodhalobhamoherṣyāviṣayaviśeṣadarśanādarśananimittam /
GSP31ttssarvu:44: nanu satsvapi vilakṣaṇeṣu bahuṣu padārtheṣu puruṣasya tatsambandhābhāvāt kathaṃ tato duḥkhamatastatsāmagrīṃ nirūpayiṣurādau buddhīndriyāṇyāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:46: abhito buddhyante jñāyante vastūnyābhirityabhibuddhayaḥ buddhīndriyāṇi cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanatvagākhyāni rūpaśabdagandharasasparśabodhakāni //
GSP31ttssarvu:47: anena ca jñānadvārā yogaṃ darśayituṃ karmendriyāṇyāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:49: pañca indriyāṇi karmayonayaḥ karmaṇāṃ vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandānāṃ yonayaḥ kāraṇāni tāni ca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthākhyāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:51_1: viṣayagrahāsambhavāt taistadgrahoktyā tāsāṃ nirūpitaprāyatvena tatsādhāraṇī vṛttirāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:53: pañcasaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānākhyāḥ vāyavaḥ mahadahaṅkāramanasāṃ sādhāraṇavṛttayaḥ jīvanasādhanāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:57: bhuktapītāhārajalāderasarudhirādeśca yathāyathaṃ prāpaṇameṣāṃ karma tadekānumeyatvena tatsvarūpātmakatā (?
GSP31ttssarvu:59: nanvastu jñānakriyādvārā mahadabhimānasarvasaṅkalpānāṃ viṣayayogitvaṃ puruṣasya svapariṇāmitayā tanna ghaṭate ityāśaṅkāṃ vinivartayiṣurāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:61: anātmasvātmakhyātiravidyā sā ca vidyāvirodhinī pañcaparvā bhavati tāni ca parvāṇi avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśākhyāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:62: tathā ca yadavidyayā viparyayeṇāvadhāryate vastu asmitādayastatsvabhāvāstadabhiniviśante tataścātmano vivekena tatsambandha iti bhāvaḥ // 13 //
GSP31ttssarvu:63: pañcāśadbhedeśu pratyayasargeṣu pañcaviparyayā nirūpitāḥ adhunā viśiṣṭeṣvaṣṭāviṃśatimaśaktimāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:65: indriyavadhā ekādaśa vuddhivadhāśca saptadaśa ityetāḥ aśaktaya ucyante /
GSP31ttssarvu:69: iti buddhivadhāstu navatuṣṭīnāmaṣṭasiddhīnāṃ ca viparyayādbhavanti taditthaṃ jātā aśaktayo 'ṣṭāviṃśatidheti // 14 //
GSP31ttssarvu:76: asyārthaḥ vivekasākṣātkāro hi prakṛtipariṇāmabhedaḥ taṃ ca saiva karotīti kṛtaṃ dhyānābhyāseneti kenacidupadiṣṭe tatra tuṣṭiḥ prakṛtyākhyā 1,
GSP31ttssarvu:77: atha prakṛteḥ sarvān pratyaviśeṣānna kevalaṃ tata eva vivekasākṣātkāraḥ kintu pravrajyayetyupadiṣṭe tuṣṭirupādānākhyā 2,
GSP31ttssarvu:78: pravrajyāpi kālaviśeṣaṇādareṇaiva vivekaṃ janayatyalamuttaptatayā ityupadiṣṭe tuṣṭiḥ kālākhyā 3,
GSP31ttssarvu:81_1: tata uparamā viratayopi pañca te ca mahadahaṅkārādīnanātmana ātmanobhimanyamānasya
GSP31ttssarvu:82: imāśca nava uktaviparyayāḥ 5 aśaktibhiḥ 28 saha dvicatvāriṃśat 42 siddhiparipanthitvāddheyāḥ // ?// 15 //
GSP31ttssarvu:84_0: tadyathā ūhaḥ śabdodhyayanaṃ 3 duḥkhavighātāstrayaḥ 6 suhṛtprāptiḥ 7 dānañca 8 siddhayoṣṭāviti
GSP31ttssarvu:84_1: tatropadeśamantareṇa tattvajñānasya svayamūhādyā asiddhiḥ sā prathamā 1 anyadīyaśāstrapāṭhamākarṇya
GSP31ttssarvu:84_3: tattvajñāne jāte siddhitrayam 6 jñānavatsuhṛdo lābhena tattvajñāne suhṛtprāptyākhyā
GSP31ttssarvu:84_4: saptamī 7 dhanādinārādhite jñānini tattvajñāne 'ṣṭamī 8 atra duḥkhavighātarūpāṇāṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:85_1: heyāḥ siddhayastu upādeyā iti tatsvarūpavyākriyayaiva sūcitaṃ bhavati // 16 //
GSP31ttssarvu:88_0: daśa arthāḥ padārthāḥ mūlikāḥ santi mūlaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣaśca tāvāśrayatvena vidyete
GSP31ttssarvu:88_1: yeṣām athavā mūlaṃ svabhāvaḥ sa prayojakatvenāsti yeṣāmiti mūlikā mūlaprakṛtau puruṣe
GSP31ttssarvu:88_2: ca vidyamānā iti yāvat tathā ca rājavārttikam /
GSP31ttssarvu:90: pārārthyaṃ ca tathā naikyaṃ viyogo yoga eva ca //
GSP31ttssarvu:92: atraikatvamarthavattvaṃ pārārthyaṃ pradhāne anyatvaṃ prakṛtyapekṣayā akartṛtvaṃ bahutvaṃ puruṣe astitvaṃ yogo viyogaścobhayoḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:94: atra prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ sādharmyavaidharmyanirūpaṇena dvayoḥ pārthakyena jñānaṃ prakṛtipuruṣānyatākhyātibījamiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:95: tathā caiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattatsvabhāvabhūtatvena prakṛtisargatāvyavahāra iti // 17 //
GSP31ttssarvu:96: nanu buddhyādibhireva triguṇātmakaiḥ sakalakāryasiddhau kimadhikaprakṛtyaṅgīkāreṇa ata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:98: buddhyādibhiḥ svakārye 'haṅkārādau janayitavye prakṛteranugrahasahāyopekṣyate anyathā buddhiḥ kṣīṇā satī nālamahaṅkāraṃ janayitumiti sakalopi sargastadanugrahamūlaka evetyarthaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:99: ayameva prakṛtyāpūra ityucyate tathā ca prakṛtyaivāyaṃ sargo neśvareṇa nāpi brahmopādāno nāpyakāraṇo neśvarādhiṣṭhitaprakṛtita iti sūcyate // 18 //
GSP31ttssarvu:103: taccettham brāhmaprājāpatyaindrapaitragāndharvayākṣarākṣasapaiśācabhedenāṣṭavidho daivaḥ paśumṛgapakṣisthāvarasarīsṛpabhedena pañcavidhastairyagyona ekavidho mānuṣya iti // 19 //
GSP31ttssarvu:104: nanu puruṣārthaśiromaṇībhūtamokṣatattvākāṅkṣā sati bandhasvarūpajñāna evopapadyate 'to bandhānevāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:109: tathā bhūtendriyāhaṅkārabuddhyupāsanaṃ vaikṛtaḥ puruṣatattvamajānataḥ kevalamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇo dākṣiṇa iti trayāṇāmiti puruṣasvarūpavedakatvābhāve bandhakatvam // 20 //
GSP31ttssarvu:112: iṣṭāpūrtādikarmasvasāratāṃ puruṣasvarūpopalabdhereva sāratāṃ buddhyamānasya prathamaḥ tato bhūtendriyādiṣvapi vikāratāṃ tataḥ pṛthagātmānaṃ jānataḥ prakṛtirūpastṛtīyaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:113: yadyapi prathamadvitīyau na tāttvikamokṣau tathāpyaikadeśikānyatākhyatyā tāvadbandhāpagamena mokṣatvavyavahāra iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP31ttssarvu:114_0: atra bandhamokṣasaṃsārāḥ prakṛtāveva na puruṣe savāsanakleśakarmāśayānāmapariṇāmini
GSP31ttssarvu:114_1: puruṣe 'sambhavāt tathā ca bhṛtyajayaparājayayoḥ svāminyupacārāt prakṛtigatānāṃ bandhādīnāṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:114_2: puruṣe upacāra eva bhogāpavargayoḥ prakṛtigatayorapi vivekāgrahāt puruṣasambandhaḥ susādhito bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:115_1: pratyātmānaṃ badhnāti tattvajñānena vivekakhyātyā ekena rūpeṇa vimocayati itīdṛśasya
GSP31ttssarvu:115_3: kevalaṃ jñānamutpadyate tenānādirapi viparyayavāsanā pratibadhyate tataścādhyavasāyābhimānasaṅkalpālocanāni
GSP31ttssarvu:115_4: antarāṇi bāhyāśca sarve vyāpārā ātmani pratiṣiddhā bhavanti ayameva mokṣa iti siddhāntaḥ // 21 //
GSP31ttssarvu:116: nanu puruṣaprakṛtyādīnāmalakṣyāṇāṃ lakṣyāṇāṃ ca ghaṭapaṭādīnāmakhilaprameyāṇāṃ laukikaiḥ kathamanubhavo vidheyo 'ta āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:118: asandigdhāviparītānadhigataviṣayā cittavṛttirbodhaśca pauruṣeyaḥ phalaṃ pramā tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP31ttssarvu:125: ekasmiṃstriguṇātmatattvayutito jātā dvidhā sāpyato dvitvaṃ prāpya prakāśayatyavirataṃ bhogāpavargau svataḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:126: ityevaṃ parisūcayan matimatāṃ mohāpahaṃ kāpilaṃ sūtrāṇāmamalaṃ dvikadvayamidaṃ jīyācciraṃ cetasi //
